Class PoisedCheck

java.lang.Object
PoisedCheck
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExistingProjects, NewProjects, PoisedMenu
public class PoisedCheck extends Object
PoisedChecks is a superclass for the Poised project.

The PoisedCheck class contains three methods which check user inputs. The three methods are inherited by the three subclasses(PoisedMenu, NewProjects and ExistingProjects) of this program to make sure that all user inputs are checked properly.

Author:
Omphemetse Marwane
